investigation.title: The influence of simulated microgravity on the proteome of Daphnia magna
investigation.description: Background/Objectives: The waterflea Daphnia is an interesting candidate for bioregenerative life support systems (BLSS). These animals are particularly promising because of their central role in the limnic food web and its mode of reproduction.

project.funding: We gratefully acknowledge the financial support of BMWi and DLR (Grant No. 50WB1029), as well as the ESA-GBF-program (Contract No. 4000103571).

publications.title: The influence of simulated microgravity on the proteome of Daphnia magna
